name: Vegan Meringues
description: Light and airy Vegan Meringues are easy to make using just 4 ingredients! They are perfectly sweet, crisp and so pretty. No one will believe they're egg free!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F and line a large baking sheet or two with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F and line a large baking sheet or two with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the aquafaba and cream of tartar to a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the aquafaba and cream of tartar to a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a hand mixer or stand mixer with the whisk attachment, beat on high for 5 minutes, until soft peaks form.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a hand mixer or stand mixer with the whisk attachment, beat on high for 5 minutes, until soft peaks form.

recipeInstructions.text: Slowly add in the sugar, a few tablespoons at a time, and continue to beat until all the sugar is added. Add the vanilla as well and keep beating, until stiff peaks are formed, about 5 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Slowly add in the sugar, a few tablespoons at a time, and continue to beat until all the sugar is added. Add the vanilla as well and keep beating, until stiff peaks are formed, about 5 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the mixture into a large piping bag and cut off the end. Pipe small circles of meringue to make the cookies, leaving an inch of space in between the cookies.
recipeInstructions.name: Spoon the mixture into a large piping bag and cut off the end. Pipe small circles of meringue to make the cookies, leaving an inch of space in between the cookies.

recipeInstructions.text: Place in the oven and bake for about 1 1/2- 2 hours. To check for doneness, take one out of the oven, let it cool for a minute, then gently open it to see if it's no longer gooey in the middle. If it's not gooey, it's done. If the middle is a bit gooey, keep baking. You want them to be fully crisp throughout.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven and store in an airtight container for about 4-5 days. They are best the day of, but taste great for several days. Enjoy!
